abstract: Unilever is introducing a new Axe brand, Axe Music, and in that theme, hosting mystery concerts, with the artists and sites announced only shortly beforehand.
snippet: Unilever is introducing a new Axe brand, Axe Music, and in that theme, hosting mystery concerts, with the artists and sites announced only shortly beforehand.
lead_paragraph: WITH the possible exception of zookeepers trying to breed pandas in captivity, surely no one mentions “mating” more than marketers at Axe, the men’s grooming brand whose racy advertisements promise young men that women will find them irresistible if they use their products.

headline.main: Making Its Own Dating Game, Axe Lines Up Concerts
headline.print_headline: Making Its Own Dating Game, Axe Lines Up Concerts
